content: the row ​ ​ 4 double_crochet in first corner space single_crochet between 2 double_crochet below 2dc between first and second sts corner made repeat on all sides finishing *skip the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet between half_double_crochet with 4dcin next space 3 double_crochet between next 2 repeat from * to corner 2dc chain 2 2dc in double_crochet 4 double_crochet in next space 3 double_crochet between next 2 corner space repeat from * around double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of starting chain 16x 7 ending with 2 double_crochet in corner space chain 1 single_crochet double_crochet shells per side +4x 25 double_crochet corner shells in top of starting chain to join 102 sts per side round 38 chain 4 counts as double_crochet ch1 double_crochet chain ​ 1 7 times double_crochet *skip 1 single_crochet in single_crochet skip 1 double_crochet chain 1 round 34 chain 5 double_crochet in corner space *skip 4 times double_crochet repeat from * to the corner skip ​ 2dc v st between next 2 double_crochet repeat from * 1 double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 4 times double_crochet chain 1 5 to corner v st in corner repeat around times skip 1 double_crochet chain 1 3 times skip 1 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of the starting chain repeat for all sides join with slip_stitch to the 34 v-sts per side 3rd chain of the starting chain 14 double_crochet in corners 80 dcs and 17 single_crochet per side round 35 slip_stitch to next chain 2 space chain 3 ​ double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in same chain space *fpdc2tog round 39 slip_stitch to chain 1 space chain 1 *2 single_crochet in ​ around the last leg of this v_stitch and first each chain 1 space skip 1 single_crochet in single_crochet skip 1 repeat leg of next v_stitch 2dc chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 2 from * around slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off space repeat from * to corner space 2dc weave in the ends you re done chain 1 2dc chain 1 2dc in corner space repeat from * around fpdc2tog end with here are links if you want to share the 2dc in corner space chain 1 join with slip_stitch to pattern top of starting chain move markers to corner https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/c shells 34 shells per side + 4 corner shells a thy-henrys-ravelry-store note if your blanket has ruffled too much ​ ​ ​ http //crochetsampler com/milis-baby-blanke t/ now
